title: Dawn
lyrics:
Dust to dust, dawn to dusk
Too quickly we were rusting
You’ve been hiding in sandcastles
You were almost out of reach
So level it out, pick up the wind
And conjure up the storms that I’d die to be caught in



You’ve got me feeling some sort of way

And you can take it all the way



Sin eater

I just want to be your sin eater

But I’m ship wrecked

And I’ve been measuring the distance

So swim to me in this tomb



Haunted by the way you pronounce my name

I phased through all your body just to get a taste

Then you undressed and called me out and I knew everything

You’re undressed, I’m blacking out

How can I leave?
